pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spring Phenological Indices // Computes the extended spring indices (SI-x) and false spring exposure indices (FSEI). The SI-x indices are standard indices used for analysis in spring phenology studies. In addition, the FSEI is also from research on the climatology of false springs and adjusted to include an early and late false spring exposure index. The indices include the first leaf index, first bloom index, and false spring exposure indices, along with all calculations for all functions needed to calculate each index. The main function returns all indices, but each function can also be run separately. Allstadt et al. (2015) doi: 10.1088/1748-9326/10/10/104008 Ault et al. (2015) doi: 10.1016/j.cageo.2015.06.015 Peterson and Abatzoglou (2014) doi: 10.1002/2014GL059266 Schwarz et al. (2006) doi: 10.1111/j.1365-2486.2005.01097.x Schwarz et al. (2013) doi: 10.1002/joc.3625.
